Set.Help: Increases the amount of [ICON_GOLD] Gold in a city and adds two additional trade route slots. Trade routes both -to- and -from- this city yield [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the city owner. May only be built by Portugal in one city.

Must have built a Market in all Cities. The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire. Gains an additional trade route slot. Trade routes other players make to a city with an East India Company will generate an extra 4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the city owner and the trade route owner gains an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for the trade route.
